title: Lemonade
lyrics:
Lyric Nosun - Lemonade

[Romanization]

I'll be okay
Sippin' lemonade
All inside my pain
Save the rain
For another day
dwireul boji ana I be cool
I be cool
I be cool, yeah
I be cool

I'll be okay
Sippin' lemonade
All inside my pain
Save the rain
For another day
dwireul boji ana I be cool
I be cool
I be cool, yeah
I be cool

I gotta get rid of all these emotions
Like I'm the man now
Got a man down
ije eokkae wie oceans
Know I can't slow it down
For the bands now
ije gominhaji anko
baro gaji
dasi meori japgo naseo
gyesok haji
ape makhyeo isseodo
nan gyesok paji
han beon neomeojyeodo
du beon ireonago dasi
Get up and grind
I ain't got time for ya lies
Baby just here for the ride
jabasseo nine
You ain't know sxxt
I got paid for the slime
sireosseo pain
But is on rotation
Guess I'm okay
But I need more patience
bwarabwatdeon light
That sxxt goin' down
wollae ireojana
All these relations, yeah

I'll be okay
Sippin' lemonade
All inside my pain
Save the rain
For another day
dwireul boji ana I be cool
I be cool
I be cool, yeah
I be cool

I'll be okay
Sippin' lemonade
All inside my pain
Save the rain
For another day
dwireul boji ana I be cool
I be cool
I be cool, yeah
I be cool

wiro nan bogo
nan swervin' that Rari
mokgeori water, water
I could never give my heart
To a thotty
eoreumman kkigo
nan turn it up louder
gieogeul jiwonogo
Okay
Hopin' I don't feel
No more pain
ige mworago
I could never stop
Baby
Just help me from this rain
du soneul moa
I pray to God
Hopin' that this sxxt don't
Happen again
I been alone
Servin' the feigns
Still gotta pay up the rent
Steady just stay in the Benz
Know we gon' slide
I can't repent now
yeogikkaji nan wasseunikka
nan wiro boji
Can't look down

[Hangeul]

I'll be okay

Sippin' lemonade

Like I'm the man now

이제 어깨 위에 oceans

이제 고민하지 않고

바로 가지

다시 머리 잡고 나서

계속 하지

앞에 막혀 있어도

난 계속 파지

한 번 넘어져도

두 번 일어나고 다시

Get up and grind

I ain't got time for ya lies

Baby just here for the ride

잡았어 nine

You ain't know sxxt

I got paid for the slime

싫었어 pain

But is on rotation

Guess I'm okay

But I need more patience

봐라봤던 light

That sxxt goin' down

원래 이렇잖아

All these relations, yeah



I'll be okay

Sippin' lemonade

All inside my pain

Save the rain

For another day

뒤를 보지 않아 I be cool

I be cool

I be cool, yeah

I be cool



I'll be okay

Sippin' lemonade

All inside my pain

Save the rain

For another day

뒤를 보지 않아 I be cool

I be cool

위로 난 보고

난 swervin' that Rari

목걸이 water, water

I could never give my heart

To a thotty

얼음만 끼고

난 turn it up louder

기억을 지워놓고

Okay

Hopin' I don't feel

이게 뭐라고

I could never stop

Just help me from this rain

두 손을 모아

여기까지 난 왔으니까

난 위로 보지

name: Nosun - Lemonade
